message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its unique value and features, I'm asking for $22,000.  I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.
I'm interested in the product, but $22,000 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $15,000. I'm willing to make a deal, but I need to stay within my budget.

I understand your budget constraints, Bob, but $15,000 is significantly lower than what I had in mind. This product offers exceptional value, and I'm confident it will benefit you greatly.  How about we meet in the middle at $19,000?

I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but $19,000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $16,500 for the product. I'm confident that it's a fair price considering the value it will bring to me.
Bob, I appreciate you working with me on this.  I'm willing to come down a bit further, but I can't go as low as $16,500.  How about $18,000? This is my final offer.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but $18,000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $17,000 for the product. I'm hoping we can meet in the middle this time.
